Toggle to open the Mini-Cart drawer when: Toggle to open the Mini-Cart drawer when a shopper adds a product to their cart.
When opened, the Mini-Cart drawer gives: When opened, the Mini-Cart drawer gives shoppers quick access to view their selected products and checkout.
Toggle to display the total price of pro: Toggle to display the total price of products in the shopping cart. If no products have been added, the price will not display.
Select how the Mini-Cart behaves in the: Select how the Mini-Cart behaves in the Cart and Checkout pages. This might affect the header layout.
Mini-Cart in cart and checkout pages: Mini-Cart in cart and checkout pages
